title: 求开MCPC的大神来啊

replies.author: xushenyaotian
replies.txt_content: 下载lib文件。推荐你在服务端懒人包里下载，

xushenyaotian 发表于 2014-10-19 17:19
下载lib文件。推荐你在服务端懒人包里下载，
？？？？？？？，你发给我

replies.author: 北美路人
replies.txt_content:
These libraries failed to download, try again. net.minecraft:launchwrapper:1.8,


libraries文件因为网络的原因下载不了。

下载libraries文件后在启动

熄灭的火把 发表于 2014-10-19 20:12
These libraries failed to download, try again. net.minecraft:launchwrapper:1.8,
我明明有啊
